comments:
CDT 2.0 M5 RC1

1. In a C++ project, bring up the New Class Wizard
2. Give the class a name "Foo"
Notice that the default header and body file are Foo.h, Foo.cpp.
3. Select "Link to file" to change header and/or body file.
4. Delete the filename(s)
5. De-select "Link to file"
6. Finish

EXPECTED: There should be better error-detection/correction here.
a) Finish should not be enabled until all fields are valid.
b) The resolved/specified filename should not be allowed to be blank.

Instead, you end up with an error dialog "New":
Creation of element failed
Path must include project and resource name: /Test

There is also an exception logged to .metadata/.log:
